title: Marcus Morris Sr. - Wikipedia
snippet: On February 28, he set a new career high with 37 points in a 120–113 overtime victory over the Portland Trail Blazers. On July 7, 2017, Morris was traded to the Boston Celtics in exchange for Avery Bradley and a 2019 second-round draft pick. On March 31, 2018, he scored 25 points in a 110–99 victory over the Toronto Raptors.

title: Who is Marcus Morris Sr.? | RevUpSports.com
snippet: Marcus Morris Sr. is an American professional basketball player born on September 2, 1989, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He plays as a power forward/small forward for the Los Angeles Clippers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Morris began his NBA career in 2011 after being selected ...
